title: SWITCH_TO_MULTI_SECONDPART
content:
0xD8295AF639FD9CB80x2349373B// SwitchToMultiSecondpart
void SWITCH_TO_MULTI_SECONDPART(Ped ped);After using SWITCH_TO_MULTI_FIRSTPART , use this native to smoothly return the camera to the player's character.Old name:  _SWITCH_IN_PLAYERExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#RegisterCommand("switchPlayer", function()
    if IsPlayerSwitchInProgress() then return end
    local ped = PlayerPedId()
    SwitchToMultiFirstPart(ped, 0, 1)
    Citizen.Wait(5000)
    SwitchToMultiSecondPart(ped)
end, false)
codeBlocks:
RegisterCommand("switchPlayer", function()
    if IsPlayerSwitchInProgress() then return end
    local ped = PlayerPedId()
    SwitchToMultiFirstPart(ped, 0, 1)
    Citizen.Wait(5000)
    SwitchToMultiSecondPart(ped)
end, false)
